# demo

``` r
library(HCCPS)

demo_data = data.frame(sample1 = runif(4,1,10),sample2 = runif(4,1,10),sample3 = runif(4,1,10))
rownames(demo_data) = HCCPS:::getID(c("SQSTM1","BIRC5","HSPB8","NCF2"))

score(demo_data)
```

``` r
score(demo_data[, 1, drop=FALSE])
```
